title: Bouncy Boulder
summaries: The Bouncy Boulder is a placeable object that begins to roll and bounce when it becomes unsupported. Once it is in motion, it will bounce several times before coming to a stop. Its motion is similar to a Bouncy Bomb, but faster, and it does damage like a Boulder. It spawns naturally on the No Traps seed, the Celebrationmk10 seed, and the Everything Seed.

statistics.Sell: 15
